# Interlude III: The Hunger of the Hustle {.unnumbered}


> "Competition is for those who believe there is enough for everyone. The Maven knows that the only thing in abundance is regret. Claim your share."
> 
> — *The Reverse Maven*

The body is heavy; the mind is fragile. Now, we enter the marketplace. We will learn the art of the "Dead Hour" and the "LinkedIn Mirage"—the two pillars of a modern professional life that offers maximum activity and zero outcome.
